SINT_Execution_Output.Summary: FD and SINT prompt synthesized under Debates (N=4). Scenario 3B (Consensus) selected for meta-synthesis. Four downstream tasks defined with explicit methodologies for Cases 2–5.

Task.title: Autonomous Maritime Port Scheduling: Safety, Throughput, and Fair Berthing
Task.objective: Run a conflict debate to balance collision-avoidance safety, throughput maximization, and fair berthing for autonomous tug-and-berth scheduling.
Task.context: Harbor traffic rules, AIS/VTMS data, weather/visibility, labor windows, emissions constraints.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3A (Conflict), ≥2 rounds with Divergence Ratings and compromise synthesis.
Task.experts: - Harbor Safety Regulator - Port Operations Optimization Engineer - Labor and Community Impact Advocate
Task.constraints: PCG; numeric ratings each round; cross-evaluation; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Compromise policy and scheduling principles with KPIs and guardrails.

Task.title: Hospital Triage Redesign for Surge Events
Task.objective: Integrate timeliness, equity, and survival outcomes into a consensus triage redesign for hospital surge conditions.
Task.context: ED bottlenecks, ICU capacity, staff shortages, ethical frameworks, data integration.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3B (Consensus); integrate and prioritize without criticism.
Task.experts: - Emergency Medicine Lead - Health Systems Operations Analyst - Bioethics and Equity Officer
Task.constraints: PCG; ratings and cross-evaluation at Step 2; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Prioritized triage protocol changes with measurable targets and monitoring.

Task.title: Data Governance Protocol for Enterprise Feature Stores
Task.objective: Use Generator+Critic to produce a governance protocol for ML feature stores covering lineage, access, drift, and retention.
Task.context: PII handling, RBAC, audit trails, schema evolution, drift flags, incident response.
Task.methodology: Generator + External Critic (N=2) with mandatory corrections and rating gates.
Task.experts: - Data Governance Architect (Generator) - Compliance and Risk Reviewer (Critic)
Task.constraints: PCG; numeric ratings for risk/coverage; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Gated governance workflow with controls, metrics, and rollback triggers.

Task.title: Multi-Drone Disaster Response: Airspace Safety vs. Search Efficiency
Task.objective: Conduct a conflict debate to balance rapid area coverage and airspace safety/comms reliability for multi-drone SAR operations.
Task.context: BVLOS regs, interference, terrain/obstacles, battery/logistics, human coordination.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=4) with Step 3A (Conflict), ≥2 rounds with divergence ratings and compromise.
Task.experts: - Aviation Safety Officer - UAS Mission Planner - Communications and Networking Specialist - Field Operations Coordinator
Task.constraints: PCG; detailed ratings and cross-evaluation; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Ranked tactics and control policies with triggers and fail-safes.
